Package com.epam.tc.service

Interface PaymentCardService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaymentCardServiceImpl
    public interface PaymentCardService
    The interface Payment card service.
    Version:
    1.0 an interface containing methods for working with an object PaymentCard
    Author:
    alex raby
